name: Bed Monsters
description:
There are monsters under your bed!

Help catch monsters from the dimension under your bed.

Upgrade your flashlight to go further and to catch more as you explore the depth for exciting new monsters.

How far can you go? What strange new monsters will you catch?

Bed Monsters features:
- Simple and addictive gameplay: just tap to catch!
- Idle gameplay: earn money while you are away!
- Become a monster collector: Hundreds of beautiful, unique monsters for you to discover!
